error.name: Failing high-memory
error.description: TaskTrackerMemoryManager fails the task for exceeding memory limit

error.name: Killing high-memory
error.description: TaskTrackerMemoryManager kills the task for exceeding memory limit

error.name: Killing CGroup_high_memory
error.description: CGroupMemoryWatcher kills the task for exceeding memory limit

error.name: Hive Runtime Error
error.description: Error from processing a row in Hive

error.name: Lost task tracker
error.description: TaskTracker has no heartbeat. The tasks it tracks and maps has output on it failed.

error.name: Too many fetch-failures
error.description: A finished map failed because its map output cannot be fetched for many times.

error.name: Map output lost
error.description: TaskTracker cannot find the map output file of a map finished on it.

error.name: failed to report
error.description: Task failed to report its status back to TaskTracker for a long time

error.name: Error launching task
error.description: TaskTracker cannot localize and launch the task

error.name: Java heap space OOM
error.description: Task tries to use more java heap space than configured Xmx

error.name: No space left on device
error.description: TaskTracker cannot find a disk with enough space for the task

error.name: No space left on device
error.description: TaskTracker cannot find a disk with enough space for the task
